mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS "userId", USER_FAMILY_NAME AS "familyName", USER_FIRST_NAME AS "firstName", USER_AGE AS "userAge" FROM USER_TEST WHERE TO_NUMBER(USER_ID) < 10000 ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(USER_ID)

SELECT O.ORDR_ID AS "ordrId", O.CUST_ID AS "custId", C.CUST_NAME AS "custName", D.DETL_ID AS "detlId", D.PROD_ID AS "prodId", P.PROD_NAME AS "prodName", D.QUANTITY AS "quantity", TO_NUMBER(D.QUANTITY) * TO_NUMBER(P.UNIT_PRICE) AS "amount", TO_CHAR(O.ORDR_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "orderDate" FROM PRODUCT_ORDER O LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT_ORDER_DETAILS D ON O.ORDR_ID = D.ORDR_ID, CUSTOMERS C, PRODUCTS P WHERE O.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID AND D.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID
